memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t *all_lengths, size_t count, uint8_t *compressed_lengths, uint16_t *cl_frequencies, uint8_t *extra_bits_values, size_t *compressed_count)
memberdef.name: compressCodeLengths

briefdescription.para: Creates the Huffman tree from the populated Min-Heap.

listitem.para: This is the greedy algorithm core: repeatedly combine the two smallest nodes.

parameterdescription.para: The initialized Min-Heap containing all leaf nodes.

simplesect.para: Node* The root of the completed Huffman tree.

briefdescription.para: Traverses a Huffman tree to determine the bit length (depth) for every symbol.

parameterdescription.para: The current node in the traversal (start with the tree root).
The depth of the current node (start with 0 for the root).
The array where the resulting code lengths are stored.
